name: Heart of Eternity: An Oath Keeper Story
name_original: Heart of Eternity: An Oath Keeper Story
description:
Annalise lives a comfortable life as a Guardian for a backwater town with her friends. But when a mysterious stranger with an even more bizarre job for the crew arrives, everything changes.

Heart of Eternity is a short role-playing game focused around dungeon exploration and combat. Use the complex mechanics and steer your team to victory.

A submission for the Oath Keeper game jam. Made in RPG Maker MV.
